text: Cran-Grevier is a former commune. It is in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Haute- Savoie department in southeast France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the commune of Annecy.Arrêté préfectoral 14 July 2016 == Twin towns == Cran- Grevier is twinned with: * Piossasco, Italy * Trenčín, Slovakia * Bathgate, Scotland == References == Category:Former communes in Haute-Savoie Category:Annecy
title: Cran-Gevrier
